A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I always go into the new star war movies expexting them to suck and with The Last Jedi that's almost the case. It's redeemed by the excellent cinematography but that's not enough to carry the slow plot and poor pacing. It also features some of the most hated characters in Star Wars and that includes Jar Jar and the ewoks. The ending is good\, but the first half is just plain bad.
